history.proof: intros p a b H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> eqP A eqA n (mults (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) p) (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (mults a p) (mults b p))

Premises:
zeroP : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
plusTerm : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
canonical : forall A : Type, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename

plusP_com : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p q r s : list (Term A n), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM p q r ->...-> eqP A eqA n r s
nzeroP_multTerm : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
plusP_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)
plusP_inv1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) ->...-> s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q))
pluspf_inv2_eq : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a b -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q) = pluspf...
pluspf_inv1_eq : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a -> pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)) = pluspf A...
pluspf_is_plusP : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) (l1 l2 : list (Term A n)), plusP A A0 eqA plusA n ltM l1 l2 (pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec l1 l2)
canonical_mults_inv : forall (p : list (Term A n)) (a : Term A n), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (mults a p) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p
mults_eqp_zpO : forall a : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall p : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n (mults a p) (pO A n) -> eqP A eqA n p (pO A n)
splus : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (A -> A -> A) -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), (forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}) -> OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM -> poly A0 eqA ltM
pO_pluspf_inv2 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec p (pO A n)
pO_pluspf_inv1 : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall p : list (Term A n), p = pluspf A0 (eqA:=eqA) plusA eqA_dec (ltM:=ltM) ltM_dec (pO A n) p
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
eqp_imp_canonical : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n p q -> canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> canonical A0 eqA ltM q
zeroP_plusTermr : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
zeroP_plusTerml : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b)
moreCoefStructure.A_sep : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
zeroP_multTerm_l : forall (A : Type) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)

```coq
intros p a b H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.
intros H6 H7 H8 H9 H10.
apply pluspf_inv3b with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (ltM:=ltM) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) in H5 as H11.
apply eqP_sym in H11.
apply pluspf_inv1 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (ltM:=ltM) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) in H11 as H12.
apply eqp_pluspf_com_l with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in H5 as H13.
apply eqP_sym in H13.
apply plusP_inv2 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H14.
apply plusP_inv1 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H15.
apply canonical_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) in H5 as H16.
apply order_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H17.
apply plusP_com with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in cs as H18.
apply zeroP_plusTermr with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H19.
apply zeroP_plusTerml with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H20.
apply moreCoefStructure.A_sep with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H21.
apply zeroP_multTerm_l with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H22.
```

original: intros p a b H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. intros H6 H7 H8 H9 H10. apply pluspf_inv3b with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (ltM:=ltM) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) in H5 as H11. apply eqP_sym in H11. apply pluspf_inv1 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) (ltM:=ltM) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) in H11 as H12. apply eqp_pluspf_com_l with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (multA:=multA) (divA:=divA) in H5 as H13. apply eqP_sym in H13. apply plusP_inv2 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H14. apply plusP_inv1 with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H15. apply canonical_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) in H5 as H16. apply order_pluspf with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (eqA_dec:=eqA_dec) (n:=n) (ltM:=ltM) (ltM_dec:=ltM_dec) in H10 as H17. apply plusP_com with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in cs as H18. apply zeroP_plusTermr with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H19. apply zeroP_plusTerml with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H20. apply moreCoefStructure.A_sep with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H21. apply zeroP_multTerm_l with (A:=A) (A0:=A0) (A1:=A1) (eqA:=eqA) (plusA:=plusA) (invA:=invA) (minusA:=minusA) (divA:=divA) in H18 as H22.
